headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HACKELL, SIDNEY PAUL

snippet: HACKELL--Sidney Paul. Long Beach, NY. Beloved husband of Sally. Loving father of Jesse (Judy), Laura, Veda (Tomislav), Stella (Frank). Grandpa of Matthew (Karen), Rebecca (Joshua). Great-grandfather of Juniper and Asher. A gracious and generous man. Contact Hellman Chapels 845-356-8600. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HACKELL--Sidney Paul. Long Beach, NY. Beloved husband of Sally. Loving father of Jesse (Judy), Laura, Veda (Tomislav), Stella (Frank). Grandpa of Matthew (Karen), Rebecca (Joshua). Great-grandfather of Juniper and Asher. A gracious and generous man. Contact Hellman Chapels 845-356-8600. 1/3
